results.content: I am very to have done this course. Yes it certainly helped me to become confident in terms of designing a WordPress theme. I was all along thinking of only downloading a WP theme and designing a site. Now I am confident of starting to build a theme by myself and maybe one day I will be able to sell it and make money in the market place. Thanks a lot for the course instructor who is good in explaining the concepts lucidly. Thanks Udemy.

results.content: The course is only OK to get basic understanding of a WP theme concepts and development. However, it's too basic for those who already has some knowledge about WP. It also could mislead newbies, because today developing WP themes from scratch is not a good practice: one should use frameworks, such as Underscores and Unyson. So don't try this at home! :)
results.content_html: The course is only OK to get basic understanding of a WP theme concepts and development. However, it's too basic for those who already has some knowledge about WP. It also could mislead newbies, because today developing WP themes from scratch is not a good practice: one should use frameworks, such as Underscores and Unyson. So don't try this at home! :)

results.content: The lessons are quite profound, but the instructor's pace is very fast when switching from the text editor to Wordpress C-panel and vice versa. And because the video presentation is of poor quality, I give only three and a half stars.
results.content_html: The lessons are quite profound, but the instructor's pace is very fast when switching from the text editor to Wordpress C-panel and vice versa. And because the video presentation is of poor quality, I give only three and a half stars.

results.content: The course is excellent. Aryan makes it easy to understand and develop in Wordpress. I would definitely recommend this course to anyone who is thinking about it.
results.content_html: The course is excellent. Aryan makes it easy to understand and develop in Wordpress. I would definitely recommend this course to anyone who is thinking about it.

results.content:
I have tried several course to create my theme from scratch but only this one taught me how to do.

Everything well explained but a little fast-paced. Must have for WordPress developers and designers

results.content:
I've watched several WordPress theme courses but all those taught me how to edit existing themes or use any templates.

But this one completely different. I taught me how can I convert my HTML into WordPress theme. I'm a freelancer and real-world project approach was superb. Never saw such real project based, hands-on training.
results.content_html:

results.content: It's really practical and helped me a lot! Thanks!

results.content: I am liking this course a lot. Good quick pace is keeping me engaged.

results.content: Really enjoyed it. A great start for beginners in WP dev

results.content:
Perfect course for who wants to learn real WordPress. I really liked the no-plugin approach since it gives me greater amount of control over theme. Ajax and Form section is awesome.

The project in those looks 100% real.

results.content: The video is dry and the instructor's voice is monotone. The material could be more interesting.

results.content:
Much more than just a course. This course teaches you real world WordPress stuff. 

Waiting for more course from the same author. Cheers!!!

results.content:
Partly my fault: I bought this course because the description looked interesting. I didn't watch the sales video (my fault, but I never do) and waited more than 30 days before I started watching.

English is not my native language, nor is it the instructors... and our interpretation of the English language differs that much, that I really didn't understand a word he's saying. It even took me time to realize it was actually English.
results.content_html:
